title: Yes Bank appoints Sumit Bali country head, retail assets and debt management
description: Yes Bank has named Sumit Bali as the Country Head for Retail Assets and Debt Management. Bali brings over 30 years of experience and will focus on enhancing retail and rural assets and debt management growth. He has previously worked in leadership roles at Axis Bank, India Infoline Group, and Kotak Mahindra Bank.
